Class Elements

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--Elements
Direct Known Subclasses:
Alien
abstract class Elements
extends java.lang.Object

This class contains the data and polymorphic methods needed to create and draw the elements of the game.

Method Detail

polyDraw

void polyDraw(java.awt.Graphics g)
This is the polymorphic draw method. In this class (the base class) this method will have an empty body. It is actually implemented in the child classes.
